website_summaries.verdict: The original, best-selling boots from a brand name U.S. manufacturer.
pros: Breathable boots suitable for all equestrian sports
Offer impact protection and support to help prevent hyperextension injuries
Easy to put on and off
Well-made and look good even after repeated use
cons: Can make the horses’ legs warm

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, arrived on time and fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: These boots are perfect! I ordered them on Sunday April 10th and they arrived by Friday April 15. We had a big camping trip planned and they came right on time! I have a 14.2 hand gaited gelding who I bought them for. The size small fit him perfectly. I had no issues with these boots and I used them on a camping trip this weekend with heavy rock. Over the whole weekend they held up, stayed in place. They were muddy on the outside but clean on the inside by the end of the day. Had no issues with anything getting inside them or slipping. Very happy!!! I ordered SIZE small/COLOR turquoise.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy

customer_reviews.title: Great But Tip About Sizing
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. A warning: If you have a small-boned horse DO NOT go up a size in the rear legs. Stay the same size as the front legs or the boots will be too big. My quarter pony mare uses small boots in front and was swimming in the mediums in her back legs. Just want to help others. Otherwise, fantastic, supportive, well made,
customer_reviews.author: BE

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 15HH quarter horse mare perfect. I bought a medium for her back legs. They are super good quality too. I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The picture of the pacific blue is a little different than the actually product, but it's a beautiful color! I ordered the medium pacific blue and it it's great and looks great on my 14.3hh palomino! I love this brand and will defiantly be buying some more professionals choice!
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: Great for additional support for an older gelding on the trail.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 16 hand, 1200 lb paint gelding. Medium build. Size medium works great. He's an older boy and I use these to help support his legs out on the trail. Fairly easy to clean, but definitely need to be hung out to dry when they get wet.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: I love them so much
customer_reviews.text: I love them so much!!! They are so amazing!!! They look wonderful on my horse and I wish I could give 10 stars.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: ... them for about a year and they still look like new.
customer_reviews.text: I've had them for about a year and they still look like new.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: This product has very strong Velcro and is very easy to throw in the washing machine to wash. They did what they were supposed to and protected my horses legs during cow sorting. I will buy this product again when my current ones wear out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the second pair of these I have used ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these I have used. My mare had a number of injuries to her lower legs when she was younger and these really seem to help her on the trail
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre quality. Color is vibrant.
customer_reviews.text: Color is accurate, fit is good. Velcro is low quality. Good news is they aren’t overly expensive.
customer_reviews.author: KAS

customer_reviews.title: Fit great!
customer_reviews.text: I got medium for my 14.3 hand horse...he is grey and the blue looked really pretty on him!
customer_reviews.author: Leesa Wachsman

customer_reviews.title: Works on 14.2 pony
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my paint pony. I got medium for her even though her size would have suggested small and medium is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit at all
customer_reviews.text: I followed the suggested sizing and ended up having to return these as they didn't even come close to fitting properly (way too small). If I had used them, they 100% would have given my horse major sores.
customer_reviews.author: ann b. burke

customer_reviews.title: Demos, not new. At least for me.
customer_reviews.text: Right color, right size. Usual quick prime shipping. However, these boots were obviously used as a demo. They arrived with dirt and horse hair on the inside. It doesn’t affect the function, and they can be washed. But a little disappointing when you’re expecting new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots but wish that I measured better. They were too big on my 14.2 mare
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, and fits well.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves them, and the go perfectly with her new saddle.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Ashford

customer_reviews.title: Pretty in purple
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect color of purple and fit my horse perfectly. I love the product!! They are holding their color very well tooo.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and off
customer_reviews.text: Easy on and off, fit well, royal blue is great color, they do pick up burrs and leaves though, washed on cold on machine-came out beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Kokapeli

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sport boot
customer_reviews.text: Great quality sport boot with good support and it is easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kori H.

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: My horse has a tendon issue and these leg supports have made all the difference in his day. Easy to use and keep clean. They are very comfortable and helping Peanut heal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old school buyer
customer_reviews.text: Have use PC brand for ever. Never been disappointed. Delivery time was terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with my purchase and will likely buy another pair ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and works well. I am pleased with my purchase and will likely buy another pair for his hind legs
customer_reviews.author: CurO

customer_reviews.title: The sizing chart was right on!
customer_reviews.text: They fit my mare perfectly and the color is great!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Allen

customer_reviews.title: great support for sprained tendons
customer_reviews.text: great support for sprained tendons, the only problem in hot weather legs get sweaty and scalded, so he only wears them at night at the moment. Leg wraps allow him to go out with other horses. We havent ridden in them yet, not quite sound enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Shook

customer_reviews.title: Consistent quality over the years
customer_reviews.text: Liked the quality. Does not have many seams to run on my mare’s legs,
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Powell-Florip

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I already own a black pair and wanted a white pair for my paint horse. Hold up well and easy to clean. Do the job they are designed for.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Pritchett Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect sizing. great quality. A bit warm on the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Cath B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came in nice shape, true to color, and they fit my horse nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Sosinsky

customer_reviews.title: Prefer over ventech
customer_reviews.text: Prefer over the ventech because they don't shift and twist like the ventech does on my horse's legs, but they definitely make my horse's legs sweat more than the ventech.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Do I need a pair for both the front and back legs?
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D

customer_reviews.title: These boots fit her beautifully and will defiantly be purchasing a pair for her ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast and showed up way earlier than expected. These boots fit her beautifully and will defiantly be purchasing a pair for her hind legs. I use them to prevent injury to her legs while out riding and they look like they will work beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: The Dog Witch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great protection for our 4 year olds legs while she is getting worked. Holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: dragonflyJJ

customer_reviews.title: good boot
customer_reviews.text: Runs bigger than other professional choice but it still alive good boot for the price, got a medium and it ran big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors and the product
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my horse so when we go riding or when I'm working him in the round pen
customer_reviews.author: maggie

product_meta.title: Professionals Choice Equine Smbii Leg Boot, Pair
product_meta.description: SMB IIs are the best selling equine leg care products in the world. They have protected countless performance horses over the years in every imaginable event, including polo, jumping, reining, barrel racing, endurance, working cow horse and many others. For many horse--s, these boots have meant the difference between an extended career and periodic or permanent injuries. So, it’s no wonder there have been numerous attempts to copy them. 30-Day money-back guarantee/six-month warranty or as required by law. Sold in pairs.
feature_bullets: Contoured and shaped to provide the perfect fit
Provides impact protection, safeguarding the cannon bone, tendons, and soft tissue
Flexible suspensory strap allows for full movement and eliminates fetlock hyper-extension
Adjustable Velcro closures keep boot comfortably secure
